A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A sad disappointment to the Star Wars trilogy. Reminded me of Attack of the Clones\, and the other prequels. With all of the CGI effects\, this movie lacks both the relavent story line of Star Wars The Force Awakens\, as well as live action scenes TFA offers. The Last Jedi also tries to play out as a \"comedy\" movie... the Star Wars trilogy has no room for lame jokes\, poorly timed jokes\, and irrelevant story line scenes.
